head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GALVIN, JOHN F. III

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GALVIN, JOHN F. III

block.p: GALVIN--John F. III, Southampton, NY passed away July 1, 2006. Beloved husband of Mary and Father of Abbie, Jock, Ria and Robby. For those who want to remember ''Happy Jack'' a Mass of Resurrection will be held on Thursday 10:00 AM at Sacred Hearts of Jesus & Mary RC Church, 168 Hill St. in Southhampton. For information contact the O'Connell Funeral Home at 631-283-0098.
